seo.title: Adopting Bitcoin – A Lightning Summit 2022
seo.description: Bringing together the Bitcoin and Lightning Network communities with local actors in El Salvador on November 15-17  to work on the mission to adopt Bitcoin successfully. The conference is not-for-profit and all proceeds will be donated.
seo.keywords: bitcoin, adopting bitcoin, el salvador, conference, lightning, lightning network
seo.speakerDescription: Meet {name} of {company} on November 16-18 in San Salvador

header.title: Adopting Bitcoin
header.subtitle: A Lightning Summit in El Salvador

jointhenetwork.title: Adopting bitcoin is back in El Salvador
jointhenetwork.text1: The Bitcoin Law of El Salvador created the most Bitcoin friendly environment in the world with millions of users and thousands of companies using the Bitcoin network in daily transactions.
jointhenetwork.text2: This novel situation comes with both, the challenge to onboard users, and the opportunity to learn from them for the benefit of the entire ecosystem - from protocol and application devs to entrepreneurs and investors.
jointhenetwork.text3: A successful adoption of Bitcoin at this scale will be a historic milestone that will benefit both Salvadorans and the Bitcoin ecosystem for years to come, and serve as a blueprint for peoples that want to follow the footprint of Salvadorans.

locations.title: IN THE HEART OF THE COUNTRY
locations.directionsText:
November 15, 16 & 17, 2022
89 Avenida Norte, San Salvador, SV

speakers.title: SPEAKERS
speakers.callforparticipation_text:
If you’d like to speak at Adopting Bitcoin 2022, please fill out the submission form below.
The deadline to submit your topic for Adopting Bitcoin is July 17, 2022.

subscribe.title: SUBSCRIBE TO OUR MAILING LIST
subscribe.text: Stay up to date on Adopting Bitcoin and get all the important news right to your mailbox

contactus.title: CONTACT US
contactus.proceeds: All proceeds of the conference will be donated to the development of the Lightning Network.

earlyAdopters.title: Ticket price schedule
earlyAdopters.text: We‘ve got our own „halving“ at work, get in early get the better price.

tickets.otherConferences:
Get ready for a full week of Bitcoin events!

Bitcoiners from around the world will be flocking to El Salvador for our flagship event "Adopting Bitcoin" -- the first global Lightning Summit in more than two years.
There will be several other events taking place during the same week. Most notably LABitConf.com, with a hackathon starting Nov 15, and a business conference starting Nov 18.
(NOTE: you will need to purchase separate tickets to attend LABitConf)

If you are planning a satellite event, please reach out, so that we can coordinate on behalf of all visitors and attendees.
